name: SocialLoginController

methods.name: getSamlSsoUrl
methods.signature: public static String getSamlSsoUrl(String startUrl, String samlId)
methods.description: Returns the URL to the SAML provider for the community.

params.name: samlId
params.description: Path to the page that users see when they access the community. Unique identifier of the SAML provider.

methods.name: getSsoUrl
methods.signature: public static String getSsoUrl(String startUrl, String developerName)
methods.description: Returns the single sign-on URL for the community.

params.name: developerName
params.description: Path to the page that users see when they access the community. Unique name of the authentication provider.

description: Represents the social authentication providers configured for the community. For internal use only.
